## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? (e.g., "I'm always frustrated when...")

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case

Describe your use case and how this feature would benefit you and others.

## Implementation Ideas

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, share them here (optional).

## Related Features

Are there any existing features this would build upon or relate to?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

- [ ] I would be willing to implement this feature myself and submit a PR
